mapper.select: select u.id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.img from user u inner join groupuser g on g.user_id = u.id where g.group_id=#{groupId}
mapper.delete: delete from groupuser where group_id = #{groupId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update groupuser set notice_check=true where user_id = #{userId}
